pullrequest.title: Fix drc practice launch files, and models and world for task 6

content.raw:
I'm not sure where the bdi_stand parameter should be.

I did the drc_practice launch files in a clean way, with the bdi_stand parameter in [drc_practice.launch](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/7f9980986aee5a2a59697766a70ed1bc978efed4/drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_practice.launch?at=fix_drcpractice_launch#cl-8). I think the vrc_task launch files could benefit from refactoring, but I didn't bother for this pull request.
content.html:
I'm not sure where the bdi_stand parameter should be.

I did the drc_practice launch files in a clean way, with the bdi_stand parameter in drc_practice.launch. I think the vrc_task launch files could benefit from refactoring, but I didn't bother for this pull request.
